abstract.p: Weekly report of residential sales; graphs; photos (L)

block.p: In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

$825,000 298 Elizabeth Street 1,400-sq.-ft. open-space condo in a prewar building; 1 1/2 marble baths, whirlpool, washer/dryer, h/w floors, 3 exposures; common charge $454; taxes $5,940; listed at $825,000, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Corcoran Group)
In the following reports, the ''listed at'' price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent listing to contract.

$825,000 298 Elizabeth Street 1,400-sq.-ft. open-space condo in a prewar building; 1 1/2 marble baths, whirlpool, washer/dryer, h/w floors, 3 exposures; common charge $454; taxes $5,940; listed at $825,000, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Corcoran Group)

$1.35 million 374 West 11th Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,758-sq.-ft. condo in a recently constructed building; limestone baths, hardwood floors, stainless steel kitchen with granite countertops and cherrywood cabinets, fireplace, Hudson River view; common charge $640; taxes $7,665; listed at $1.35 million, 13 weeks on market (Broker: Eychner)

$327,500 301 East 62nd Street 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,100-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, windowed kitchen and bath, h/ w floors, 2 exposures, roof deck in building; maintenance $1,100, 65% tax-deductible; listed at $349,000, 24 weeks on market (Broker: Peter Ashe Realty)

$773,000 645 West End Avenue (91st Street) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,100-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining room, maid's room, windowed kitchen, mahogany beamed ceilings, decorative fireplace, Hudson River view; maintenance $948, 47% tax-deductible; listed at $725,000 (multiple bids), 4 weeks on market (Broker: Halstead Property Co.)

$550,000 200 Riverside Boulevard (Trump Place) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,054-sq.-ft. condo in a recently constructed building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, h/w floors, north exposure; common charge $521; taxes (abated) $144; listed at $550,000, 3 weeks on market (Broker: Douglas Elliman)

$185,000 2720 Fenton Avenue 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 46-year-old attached brick house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, finished basement, private drive, 1-car garage, 18-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,300; listed at $205,000, 8 weeks on market (Broker: J.A.V.)

$144,000 155 City Island Avenue 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 100-year-old detached frame house; dining room, eat-in kitchen; needs renovation; 50-by-53-ft. lot; taxes $1,000; listed at $150,000, 21 weeks on market (Broker: Jacqueline Kyle Kall)

$310,000 337 Bay Ridge Parkway 4-bedroom, 2-bath, circa-1900 2-story town house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, high ceilings, h/w floors, 20-by-94-ft. lot; taxes $1,930; listed at $339,000, 6 weeks on market (Broker: Century 21/DeMasi)

$375,000 991 East 10th Street 4-bedroom, 1-full- and 2-half-bath, 70-year-old semiattached brick house; dining room, dinette, finished basement, 2-car garage, 22.6-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,900; listed at $419,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Wilk)

$287,000 217-15 64th Avenue 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 50-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, renovated baths, c/a, finished basement, new hardwood floors and carpets, 33-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,781; listed at $295,000, 7 weeks on market (Broker: ReMax/Millennium)

$272,000 152-29 11th Avenue 2-bedroom, 1-bath semiattached house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, finished basement, 2-zone heat, new windows, 25-by-145-ft. lot; taxes $1,696; listed at $272,000, 5 weeks on market (Brokers: ReMax Millennium; ERA United)

$245,000 353 Fanning Street 2-family, 27-year-old attached town house; 3 bedrooms, 2 baths, dining room, eat-in kitchen in primary unit; 1 bedroom, 1 bath, utility room in other; 32-by-99-ft. lot; taxes $1,662; listed at $249,500, 1 week on market (Broker: Salmon)

$680,000 21 Pond Lane 5-bedroom, 3-bath, 42-year-old split-level; family room, fireplace, laundry room, semifinished basement, 2-car garage, 1.5-acre lot; taxes $7,917; listed at $689,000, 2 weeks on market (Brokers: Houlihan/Lawrence; Vannier)

$775,000 33 Spring Hill Lane 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 4-year-old colonial; eat-in kitchen, 2 fireplaces, patio, dining room, family room, office, exercise room, 2-car garage, 2-acre lot; taxes $17,572; listed at $735,000 (multiple bids), 4 weeks on market (Broker: Randolph Properties)

$294,000 25 Corley Street 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 47-year-old ranch; entry hall, fireplace, dining room, porch, modern eat-in kitchen, unfinished basement, 2-car garage, 75-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $7,802; listed at $299,000, 18 weeks on market (Brokers: Margot Bennett; Prudential Ragette)

$177,000 9 Parkway North Drive 2-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 53-year-old ranch; stone fireplace, remodeled eat-in kitchen, deck, fireplace, attic, 75-by-141-ft. lot; taxes $2,437; listed at $179,900, 22 weeks on market (Brokers: Randolph Properties; Houlihan/Lawrence)

$530,000 15 Jacobs Lane 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 2-year-old colonial; 2-story entryway, dining room, kitchen with pantry and granite countertops, family room with fieldstone fireplace, whirlpool, 3-car garage, 1.94-acre lot; taxes $7,581; listed at $549,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential Connecticut)

$700,000 172 Field Point Road (Field Point Estates) 3-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 14-year-old town-house condo; dining room, living room with fireplace, family room, balcony, c/a, 2-car garage; common charge $285; taxes $4,951; listed at $725,000, 3 weeks on market (Brokers: Coldwell Banker/Greenwich; William Pitt)

$259,900 189 Harrison Place 3-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 36-year-old ranch; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, 1-car garage, 0.80-acre lot; taxes $4,121; listed at $269,900, 19 weeks on market (Brokers: William Orange; William Raveis)

$375,000 10 Thornhill Road 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 74-year-old Tudor; dining room, fireplace, powder room, 2-car garage, 121-by-85-ft. corner lot; taxes $3,676; listed at $375,000, 7 weeks on market (Brokers: MIC; New England Land Co.)

$499,000 14 Fox Hollow Ridings Road 5-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 19-year-old contemporary ranch; dining room, eat-in kitchen, pool, 1-acre lot; taxes $9,000; listed at $499,000, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Anastasio)

$460,000 91 Hampshire Road 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 72-year-old colonial; new eat-in kitchen, dining room, den, finished basement, fireplace, patio, 1-car attached garage, 60-by-150-ft. lot; taxes $4,700; listed at $499,000, 8 weeks on market to come (Broker: Trylon)
$213,000 20 Stonecutter Road 4-bedroom, 1-bath, 51-year-old ranch; eat-in kitchen, 1-car attached garage, 60-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $4,100; listed at $219,000, 8 weeks on market (Broker: Manor Gate)

$305,000 18 Fordham Street 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 70-year-old colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, 1-car garage, 40-by-103-ft. lot; taxes $4,900; listed at $325,000, 10 days on market (Broker: Atanas)
$375,000 45 Cindy Lane 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 32-year-old split-level; fireplace, c/a, 2-car garage, 100-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $6,954; listed at $379,900, 1 week on market (Broker: Coldwell Banker)

$137,900 206 Hampshire Court 5-bedroom, 3-bath, 15-year-old condominium town house; foyer, fireplace, h/w floors; common charge $133; taxes $3,351; listed at $137,900, 1 day on market (Broker: Weichert)

$409,900 29 Springhill Road 4-bedroom, 3-bath, 23-year-old colonial; eat-in kitchen, family room, fireplace, 2-car garage, 1/2-acre lot; taxes $7,499; listed at $429,900, 2 weeks on market (Broker: Prudential New Jersey)
